about_the_game:
Taiki is your average guy. He’s nineteen years old, in his first year of university, and he’s just starting to learn what it means to be an adult.

During the summer vacation, Taiki goes to the countryside to stay with his grandparents, as as does his siblings: the haughty, fashionable Chiharu; the troublemaker with a love of all things gothic, Nene; and the sweet, shy Reza.

Taiki hopes, during the summer, he’ll have a chance to relax after spending several months studying – but it’s not to be. A game of hide-and-seek goes badly awry when Nene, the miscreant that she is, slinks off into their grandfather’s study, which is strictly out of bounds.

Inside their grandfather’s shadowy study, Nene finds a treasure trove of dusty old books about all sorts of eerie, arcane subjects, including a tome full of instructions on how to summon demons from another realm.

Nene, of course, sets about this demonic summoning ritual at once – and, upon its successful completion, she manages to call upon a fearsome figure from the deepest, darkest depths of hell…

Who just so happens to be a cute girl with pink hair and an impressive bust?!

Now Taiki’s in a real pinch. Not only does he have to look after his siblings, but he also has his demonic guest, Elisabeth, to contend with – and she’s head over heels with Taiki.

What in the world is Taiki going to do now?!



  • 90k of text (approx 4-6 hours of reading)
  • A kinetic story with no choices or branches
  • Detailed character artwork
  • A lot of pretty backgrounds of the Japanese countryside
  • A soothing OST
  • A very cute demon girl
  • A light, sweet, fluffy romance story!
